name: b/r – the colorfully dark Facebook theme
description:
The concept was to create an eye friendly fb theme with a lively and clean character, based on the power of colors rather than flashiness. Blue/red is a very common, somewhat boring, and even stern color pair. With the right kind of shades it's what I find the most expressive, uplifting and subtle one.
  • Full theme – more than 99% of FB is styled in detail.
  • Kept optimized and to the point to compensate the heavy load of styling.
  • Updated regularly.
